data.description:
Welcome to MYX Virtual Events Platform, a next-gen VR experience Exclusive to the Quest, 
MYX will take you on a night-out experience you will never forget.

Why Choose MYX? Why watch a YouTube Live Stream event, when you could virtually be there at it. 

MYX is currently in Early Access so some features and venues are still in development but we will release them as they become ready to share, ensuring this world will continuously unfold as you play over time. 

COMING SOON: 
MORE CLUBS: We are working with some of the Coolest real-world nightclubs to bring you live premium events from some of the world's hottest DJs. 
LIVE CHAT: coming and plenty more experiences that will blow your mind. 
SECRET STUFF: And heaps of secrets we can't share yet. Make sure you share, comment & review! 

but most of all Enjoy MYX - We made it with love for you. :) 

Us@funder.studio

changelog.change_log: v1.127a UPDATE! This is the big one! MYX FEST 2024, Updated beach, lets go!
v1.126c! PATCH! Fixes beach missing, updated industry, updated spyce,
v1.126b! PATCH! Fixes beach missing, updated industry, updated spyce,
v1.126a! UPDATE! OH YEA! Bigger city starting to take shape, Vegas elements implemented, performance improvements and more!
v1.125b! PATCH! Resolves some issues around DLC doors not loading, restrcutured some door locations and added new optimisations
v1.125a! UPDATE! New Scenes! New Lighting! New Features, New Fun!!
v1.123B! PATCH! Fixed crash on steps, fixed vol slider, migrated tribe scene to non dlc door
v1.123A! UPDATE! Let go Tribe!
v1.121a! UPDATE! New Years EVE dj set in Egypt!
v1.120f! patch! Fixed dj turning around issue only
v1.120e! UPDATE! Fixed broken carpark scene button
v1.120d! UPDATE! Improved performance, added NEW scenes and DJs!
v1.119b! UPDATE! Improved performance, added NEW scenes and DJs!
v1.119a! UPDATE! Improved performance, added NEW scenes and DJs!
v1.118a! UPDATE! Improved performance, added NEW outdoor arena scene!
v1.117d! PATCH! Improved performance, added some new event functionality
v1.117b! PATCH! Fixed a wee bug :) MASSIVE platform design changes, including new street, performance improvements and more!
v1.117a! UPDATE! MASSIVE platform design changes, including new street, performance improvements and more!
v1.116b! PATCH! Hot new DJ sets coming atcha from PC and Tribe
v1.116a! UPDATE! Hot new DJ sets coming atcha from Tribe
